text: Hello, how are you doing today?
I'm good, how are you?
I'm doing pretty well. I'm actually just chilling at work as it's pretty slow today. Would you have a few moments to talk about a charity?
Sure. Please tell me about it.
Well the charity is called Save the Children. Have you ever heard of them before?
I think I have heard of it, but I don't know much about it.

Well Save the Children is an international non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries. It's a non profit that is run completely on donations.
What kind of work have they done already to help?
Well in 2017 alone, 155 million children were helped because of this program, including 237,000 in the US
How were they helped? Was it helping them in regards to their home life? Education? Or something else
Well a few things they help with are Education, Health, Protection (IE protection from abuse), Hunger
Sounds like a good charity
I agree. Since they're run completely on donations, do you think you could spare $2 today to help them continue their mission?
Yes I can
That's fantastic news, and I'm sure the children will truly appreciate it. Do you have any questions on how it will get to the charity?
Honestly, not really considering it's a one time donation of only $2.00 through a website I trust.
Haha that's okay, I figured I'd ask anyways, as some people are concerned. Do you have any other questions on the charity?
I don't think so
That's great. We really do appreciate your donation, and the kids will benefit from it as well
Thanks! Is there anything else I do now to complete this mturk task?
